scenes.action_text: CANDLE TO WATER Written by Nick Green Shooting draft (05/04/12) BLACK SUPER `Veracity' Then: BROOKE VO (phone filter) There's never been anyone like you, since you. I love you Vaughn. I love you like no-one else ever has, or could. I'm not going to try to persuade you. Just follow your heart. OK? FADE IN ON 1.01 INT.
